text: Villaperuccio (Sa Baronìa) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,101 people lived there. Its area is 36.43 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 68 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Villaperuccio
